row.title: Selumetinib shrinks pediatric tumors, results of an early-phase clinical trial
row.field_short_title: Dr. Widemann on how selumetinib shrinks pediatric tumors
row.field_page_description: Dr. Brigitte Widemann, leader of MyPART, describes her recent success developing treatment for a rare tumor, plexiform neurofibroma, and how natural history studies at NIH lay the foundation for finding new treatments for rare tumors.
row.field_feature_card_description: Dr. Brigitte Widemann, leader of MyPART, describes her recent success developing treatment for a rare tumor, plexiform neurofibroma, and how natural history studies at NIH lay the foundation for finding new treatments for rare tumors.
row.field_list_description: Dr. Brigitte Widemann, leader of MyPART, describes her recent success developing treatment for a rare tumor, plexiform neurofibroma, and how natural history studies at NIH lay the foundation for finding new treatments for rare tumors.
row.body: Dr. Brigitte Widemann, leader of MyPART, describes her recent success developing treatment for a rare tumor, plexiform neurofibroma, and how natural history studies at NIH lay the foundation for finding new treatments for rare tumors.

row.title: Pediatric Oncology: A Tour for New Patients
row.field_short_title: Pediatric Oncology: A Tour for New Patients
row.field_page_description: This video introduces young cancer patients to some of the places and resources found at the NIH Clinical Center.
row.field_browser_title: Pediatric Oncology: A Tour for New Patients
row.field_card_title: Pediatric Oncology: A Tour for New Patients
row.field_caption: Travis, who receives treatment at NCI's Pediatric Oncology Branch, leads a tour of the NIH Clinical Center where he and other young patients get their care.
